posts.name: Maria's Pastry Shop
posts.note: Go for the pasta but more importantly for tennis ball sized meatballs.Unassuming Italian baker offering acclaimed sweets such as cannoli, torrone, and marzipan.

posts.name: Mike's Pastry
posts.note: Renowned Italian bake shop providing cannoli in multiple flavors, gelati, and biscotti since 1946.

posts.name: Veggie Galaxy
posts.note: Imaginative twist on an old-school diner specializing in from-scratch vegan and vegetarian options. I ordered the Pearl Street Redhead Omelet (Portobellos, Caramelized Onion, Feta, Roasted Red Pepper Sauce) and don't forget to ask for home-made hot sauce.
